snippet.title: Rinse and Repeat (free male shower-sim video game I made), first two minutes
snippet.description:
Rinse and Repeat is a steamy first person showering game about giving a hunk a helping hand. Download and play the full game here: http://radiatoryang.itch.io/rinseandrepeat

⚠ "NSFW" CONTENT WARNING!!! ⚠ This game has intricately rendered naked men in it. However, all penises have been pixelated so I don't get banned from the internet. We apologize for the chilling effect of global technocapitalism on artistic expression.

DEAR YOUTUBE: It is my belief that this is documentation of a critical artistic work that does not function as pornography, and it should be allowed under YouTube's Terms of Service.

A game by Robert Yang (www.debacle.us) @radiatoryang
Music is "Vyvanse" by The Grounders, used with permission. http://groundersmusic.com/
